description:
A UNIQUE WEATHER FORECAST VISUALISATION
While most weather forecasting apps rely only on free global models, Windy has gone a few steps further and invested heavily in the most accurate models available, always at the highest possible resolution, to ensure accurate weather forecasts. 

WEATHER RADAR & SATELLITE IMAGERY
A weather radar is the most requested tool for weather forecasting. To provide the most accurate radar imagery, we constantly expand our resources so that rain, snow, and storms don't catch you by surprise. Trusted sources include NOAA, Met Office, AROME, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and others.

MORE THAN 50 WEATHER MAPS AND TOOLS

- Wind forecast (current speed, gusts, accumulation, models comparison, data from weather stations)
- Temperature, humidity, pressure, dew point, freezing altitude
- Rain, thunder, storms, precipitation type, CAPE-index
- Weather radar and Satellite images (blue, infrared, visible)
- Clouds, clouds tops, clouds base and visibility (LIFR, IFR, MVFR, VFR), fog
- Waves, swell, currents
- Solar activity maps (solar power, UV index, wet-bulb temperature)
- Snow depth, new snow, snow density
- NO2, PM 2.5, Aerosol, SO2, Ozone layer, Surface ozone, CO concentration, Dust mass
- Weather warnings & Extreme forecast 
- Soil moisture, Moisture anomaly, Drought intensity, Fire Danger, Fuel Moisture

Available global weather models and resolution: 
- ECMWF
- GFS by NOAA 
- ICON by DWD 

Available local weather models
- HRRR by NOAA
- NAM by NOAA 
- HRDPS by MSC 
- ICON-EU by DWD
- ICON-D2 by DWD
- UKV by British Met Office
- AROME-HD by Météo France
- ALADIN by CHMI
- NEMS by meteoblue
- MSM by JMA
- ACCESS-C by Australian BoM


CUSTOM WEATHER ALERTS
- Want to know about essential weather forecasts before everyone else? Set up a custom alert based on the weather in your favorite location. Whether it's wind strength, precipitation, or temperature.

HURRICANE TRACKING, STORM TRACKING
With Windy's hurricane tracking tool, you can track a hurricane's past and projected path. Windy doesn't rely on just one hurricane model but will give you all the forecasts available for a storm or hurricane.

WEATHER WIDGETS for iOS, iPadOS, MacOS
Windy serves up a quick weather overview on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as live radar by NOAA, Met Office, Meteo France, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and many other trusted sources. You can choose from several view sizes and types. 3-5 day forecast, live weather radar, live satellite, or a simple lock screen overview.

TOOLS MADE FOR PILOTS
- 16 altitude levels from the surface to 13.5km/FL450
- 50k+ Airports searchable by ICAO and IATA, including runway info, decoded & raw METARs, TAFs and NOTAMs
- Detailed Airgram and Meteogram
- Thermals forecast 
- Meteogram: temperature and dew point, wind speed and wind gusts, pressure, precipitation, altitude cloud cover
- Route planner 

WINDY FOR APPLE WATCH
Forecast, radar, METARs, and wind information in a small, lovely package.
Use the Apple Watch face by Windy.com to have it all on your screen anytime. 

Terms of Use: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-privacy-policy

GET IN TOUCH with Windy
Join us at community.windy.com to discuss weather-related topics, report bugs, or suggest a new feature. Or contact us at info@windy.com on any topic.

FOLLOW Windy ON SOCIAL MEDIA
- Facebook: facebook.com/windyforecast
- X: X.com/windycom
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@windy_forecast
- Instagram: instagram.com/windy_forecast
- YouTube: youtube.com/@Windyforecast

Get forecasts up to 16 days ahead, with detailed hour-by-hour data for the next 96 hours. Customize the experience to focus on what matters most to you — from temperature and precipitation to wind, humidity, UV index, and air quality. Explore real-time radar maps to track rain, snow, ice and cyclones in your area. Stay notified about today’s conditions and tomorrow’s outlook.
Whether you’re planning a busy week, heading outdoors, or just wondering if you’ll need a jacket, this app delivers accurate, reliable weather — fast and easy to read.
Optimized for both iPhone and iPad, with adaptive layouts to provide the best experience across all screen sizes.

# Accurate Forecasts
Stay informed with 16-day extended forecasts and 96-hour hourly breakdowns. Access key data like temperature, rain probability, wind speed and direction, cloud cover, humidity, UV index, and more — all in a single view.

# Interactive Radar Maps
Track rain, snow, ice, and cyclones in real time with high-resolution radar. Follow weather patterns around you and anticipate changes before they happen.

# Real-Time Air Quality
Keep an eye on air quality with detailed AQI readings, including PM2.5, PM10, ozone, nitrogen dioxide, carbon monoxide, and sulfur dioxide levels — updated live and presented clearly.

# Customizable Interface
Make the app your own. Choose the metrics you want to display, rearrange forecast blocks, switch between metric and imperial units, and set morning and evening weather reports at your preferred time.

# Notifications
Get timely alerts with daily summaries for the current day and upcoming forecasts — so you’re always a step ahead.

# Multiple Locations
Check the weather in all your favorite places. Your current location updates automatically using GPS, with quick access to saved locations around the world.

# Designed for Clarity
Every detail is organized for ease of use, whether you’re a casual user or a weather power user. A clean, modern interface makes checking the forecast feel effortless.


***

Some features, including Interactive Radar Maps and Real-Time Air Quality, are available with a paid subscription (3 days free, then $12.99/month or $29.99/year).

Privacy Policy: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/privacy-policy
Terms and Conditions: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/terms-and-conditions
EULA: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/eula

Weather Radar: Seamlessly plan your days with precision and comprehensive insights! Choose your preferred weather parameters, layout, and revel in personalized forecasts that align with your lifestyle. Immerse yourself in stunning weather backgrounds that mirror nature's beauty.

A GLANCE AT WEATHER

- 7-Day Weather Forecast
- 'Feels like' temperature
- Today’s maximum & minimum temperature 
- Wind direction
- Wind speed in mph, km/h, m/s, knots or Beaufort's points 
- Information on humidity and precipitations
- Atmospheric pressure and highway visibility
- Sunrise/sunset 
- Moonrise /moonset
- Pressure in mm Hg, Torr, bar, pa, psi
- °F to °C and miles to Km conversion 
- 12 or 24-hour time format
- Stay ahead of severe weather with timely alerts and warnings.

Elevate your weather experience with Premium

- Unlock a 14-day hourly forecast for precise planning.
- Navigate through interactive weather maps for enhanced insights.
- Track hurricanes and lightning with dedicated features.
- Access Lock & Home Screen widgets for added convenience.
- Dive into a min-by-min precipitation chart with Live Activity.
- Monitor air quality 
- Enjoy an ad-free experience for uninterrupted use.

Useful functions

- The photos corresponding to your location, time of day, and weather conditions. 
- Transmission of weather conditions (rain, snow, fog, or heat) using pictures with effects of animation 
- Detailed data on weather and forecasts 
- Interactive radar satellite maps, temperature maps and cards of wind, time of sunrise and sunset

Privacy Policy: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cC7xH9gqNzatVRg7JlnMBnUO-eIWGmTS6ptAMDbFht0
Terms of Use: https://docs.google.com/document/d/19SwS1tz67E22bAuCt9I7ogFO2y7rVf4_zp8iJvKKoBE

The most trusted and reliable air quality information from the world’s leading air pollution data provider. Covering 500,000+ locations from a global network of government monitoring stations and IQAir's own validated sensors. 

Recommended for sensitive people (allergies, asthma, etc), a must-have for families and great for athletes, runners, cyclists and outdoor sports activities. Plan the healthiest day with health recommendations, 48-hour forecasts, and check the real-time global air quality map. Learn what pollutants you are breathing, their sources and effects and stay informed about key air quality and wildfire breakouts in your area.

+ Historical, Real-time, and Forecast Air Pollution Data: Detailed figures on key pollutants and AQI for over 500,000+ locations in 100+ countries, made clearly understandable. Follow air pollution trends with enhanced month-long and 48h historical views for your favorite locations. 

+ Leading 7-Day Air Pollution and Weather Forecast: For the first time, plan your outdoor activities for the healthiest experiences a whole week ahead. Wind direction and speed forecasts to understand the wind’s impact on pollution. 

+ 2D & 3D World Pollution Maps: Explore real-time pollution indexes around the globe, both in a 2D panoramic view, and mesmerizing heatmapped AirVisual Earth 3D modelization. 

+ Health Recommendations: Follow our advice to lower your health risk and achieve minimum exposure to pollutants. Relevant information for sensitive groups with asthma or other respiratory (pulmonary) diseases. 

+ Weather Information: Your one-stop for temperature, humidity, wind, current conditions and forecast weather information. 

+ Wildfire and air quality events: Stay informed on wildfires, smoke, and air quality events worldwide. See alerts and track events on an interactive map with real-time & historical data, forecasts, news updates, and more. 

+ Pollen counts: View tree, weed & grass pollen counts for your favorite places and protect yourself from allergies. Plan your outdoor activities with 3-day forecasts (available in some regions only)

+ Realtime and Historic Monitoring of 6 Key Pollutants: Track live concentrations of PM2.5, PM10, ozone, nitrogen dioxide, sulphur dioxide and carbon monoxide, and observe pollutants historical trends. 

+ Real-time air pollution city ranking: Track the best and worst cities by air quality and pollution for 100+ locations worldwide, based on live PM2.5 concentrations.

+ “Sensitive Group” Air Quality Information: Relevant information and forecasts for sensitive groups, including respiratory (pulmonary) illnesses, such as asthma.

+ Extended Historical Data Graphs: View air pollution trends over the past 48 hours, or daily averages over the past month. 

+ Control your air purifier: Remotely control & monitor your Atem X & HealthPro series air purifiers for safer indoor air quality with live & historical data, comparisons, filter replacement alerts, scheduled on/off and more.

+ Indoor & Outdoor Air Quality Monitoring: Synchronization with IQAir AirVisual Pro and AirVisual Outdoor air monitors to provide readings, recommendations, and control monitor settings.

+ Air Pollution Community News: Stay up to date on air pollution current events, medical findings, and developments in combating global air pollution. 

+ Educational Resources: Build your understanding of PM2.5 and other air pollutants and learn how best to live in polluted environments with respiratory (pulmonary) illnesses such as asthma. 

+ Worldwide coverage with the most extensive network of air pollution sensors: monitor China, India, Singapore, Japan, Korea, USA, Canada, Australia, Mexico, Brazil, France, Hong Kong, Thailand, Indonesia, Chile, Turkey, Germany + more - as well as cities such as Beijing, Shanghai, Seoul, Mumbai, New Delhi, Tokyo, Mexico City, Bangkok, London, Los Angeles, New York, San Francisco, Paris, Berlin, Ho Chi Minh City, Chiang Mai + more - in one place!

- Full report. Displays all information of weather: location time, temperature, atmospheric pressure, weather condition, visibility distance, relative humidity, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction...

Using weather application and get weather information daily and daily.
Download weather forecast for and experience. The high-quality weather forecast application across your devices.

Room Temperature Thermometer – Accurate Indoor Temperature & Full Weather Insights
Stay comfortable and informed wherever you are! The Room Temperature Thermometer app is your personal weather station — right in your pocket. It not only tells you the exact room temperature, but also gives you a complete view of outdoor weather conditions, no matter where you are in the world.

 Key Features:
Room Temperature Measurement
Know your indoor temperature in real-time using your phone’s built-in sensors. Whether you’re at home, office, or in a hotel room, get accurate readings instantly. Ideal for maintaining comfort, monitoring room cooling/heating, or simply being aware of your surroundings.

Current Weather Conditions
Get up-to-date live weather data including temperature, weather conditions (like clear, rainy, cloudy), and more — based on your current location or any city you search for.

Humidity Tracker
Monitor the humidity level of your environment. Humidity plays a big role in comfort and health — now you can keep it under control with accurate humidity readings.

Wind Speed & Direction
Check wind speed and direction in real time. Whether you're planning an outdoor event or just want to stay informed during changing weather, this helps you prepare better.

Dew Point Info
Understand how humid the air feels with dew point readings. A higher dew point means more moisture in the air — useful for weather-sensitive users or those with allergies.

Today’s Weather Overview
Get a detailed forecast for the day — including temperature highs and lows, sunrise/sunset times, rain chances, and more — so you can plan ahead with confidence.

Search Weather for Any City
Type and search any city worldwide to get its current weather conditions. Whether you’re checking weather for travel, family, or business, the app makes it easy.

Weather Charts & History
View easy-to-read charts showing temperature and humidity changes over time. Track daily trends or analyze previous data to make informed decisions.

Whether you want to check the current moon phase, moon age, moonrise and moonset times, or find out when the next full moon comes, our app is there for you. Watch into the future and look up the necessary information on a certain date and time and at a particular location. This most comprehensive and accurate application keeps you informed about important sun and moon times and is even perfect for both casual users and serious moon watchers.

Track and read detailed moon information in your city and multiple locations all around the world. Search for a specific location by city/town name.

Would you like to get notified exactly one hour before the moonrise? No problem, Moon Phases and Lunar Calendar has you covered. Receive customisable notifications that will alert you to upcoming moon and sun events you're interested in. Create alerts for your exact location and the favorite cities you select. You can also add moon and sun events to your calendar.

On the main screen, you can swipe down and explore the beautiful interactive moon.

Discover in what tropical, sidereal or astronomical zodiac sign the moon and the sun are.

Our highly customisable widget will allow you to see all the essential information at a glance whenever you need it.

Important sun information is also there. Get sunrise and sunset times for any day anywhere in the world.
Find out when is the best time to take pictures outdoors: golden hour and blue hour have you covered.

Is the moon rising or falling? How much time left before the moon's culmination? Whats is the actual distance to the moon right now? When is the next moon eclipse? Get all the answers in one place. Moon Phases and Lunar Calendar is an intelligent, yet easy to use application that will make tracking the moon a breeze. 

Terms & Conditions: http://kineticstars.com/terms.html

Meet Weather. The most beautiful weather app. Ever. Now available on the App Store.

Don't let bad weather take you by surprise! Whether it is cloudy, raining, snowing or even stormy outside, Weather will provide you with current weather conditions and forecast in your city and multiple locations all around the world.

Cold or warm weather, it will magically come alive on the crisp screen of your iOS device. You won’t even have to look out the window as Weather will make you feel like you are already outside!

description:
Weather forecast is a completely free live weather application that provides a lot of essential information about local weather conditions and or anywhere in the world such as temperature, wind speed, humidity, precipitation, pressure, UV index, probability of rain, wind direction, etc.
Besides, this app also has the ability to update quite accurately the daily weather every hour and for the next 7 days forecast, sunrise time, sunset.
Features:
- Intuitive interface for easy tracking.
- Updated weather by hour
- Provide detailed information every hour about a lot of necessary meteorological conditions such as temperature, humidity, precipitation, probability of rain, wind direction, wind speed, cloud cover, UV index, pressure.
- The highest temperature, the lowest of the day
- The hour of sunrise and sunset.
- View local weather report or anywhere in the world
- Daily weather, weekly weather
- Weather forecast and update is quite accurate for 7 days forecast
- Manage the searched locations
- Optional C or F degree
- Multi-language support.
Live weather forecast provides almost all the most important information about the real time weather, you will definitely find it useful. All local weather report developments will be updated hourly and weekly weather to help you calculate the work and plan well.
Send us your feedback if you have any suggestions app@tohsoft.com

This digital thermometer displays the current temperature of your GPS position.

It displays:
+ The latitude
+ The Longitude
+ Atmospheric pressure
+ Moisture
+ The city

In addition, the temperature, the city as well as the humidity are available in the widget included in the application.

Weatherzone is your local weather app helping you confidently plan your daily life. Here’s a quick Autumn 2025 Outlook from our resident Meteorologist and check out our app features below to make the most of this season:

“This autumn is looking to be unusually warm for the UK, while rainfall should be more variable throughout the season. We’re expecting near normal rainfall for the season, but ex-tropical cyclones can bring intense periods of rain at this time of the year. There’s also potential for above average wind in the UK this autumn, due to the increased risk of ex-tropical cyclones or sub-tropical cyclones reaching Europe. As always, check the local weather forecasts and warnings for your area.”


FREE WEATHER APP FEATURES  

◆ Weather Observations: Current conditions for your local area including temperature, ‘feels like’ temperature, wind gusts, rain, humidity, dew point, and pressure. 

◆ Radar Map: Visually track where rain and snow are moving in your area with the real-time radar map. You can turn on/off other free layers including wind. 

◆ Hourly Graphs: Before you head out the door, swipe through the hourly graphs for temperature, chance of rain, rainfall amount, wind, humidity, and more. On top of knowing when it will rain and how much rain could fall, keep an eye out for the snow icon – this means the precipitation is likely to fall as snow. 

◆ Daily & Hourly Weather Forecasts: Swipe through the forecast scroller at the top of your Home tab to see hourly breakdowns of temperature, rain, and wind. Or scroll down for handy Daily Forecasts that also show these along with UV index, sunrise and sunset times.

◆ 14-day Calendars: Make plans in advance with the 14-day temperature and rainfall forecasts. Great for holidays, outdoor adventures and autumn road trips! 

◆ Warnings: Stay informed with local and government-issued warnings, including heavy rain, flooding, snow, road conditions, and more.


OTHER FREE APP FEATURES 

◆ Wind Streamlines: Follow the wind direction across the UK with animated streamlines on the radar. 

◆ 14-Day Moon Calendar: Track the moon phases along with moon rise and moon set times. 

◆ Weather Widgets: Set handy hourly and/or daily weather widgets on your iPhone home screen. You can customize the locations too! 

◆ Push Notifications: Stay informed with forecast summaries for today, tomorrow, and the week ahead.



WEATHERZONE AD-FREE ACCOUNT [ANNUAL SUBSCRIPTION]
Enjoy an ad-free experience on the Weatherzone app. Simply sign up for an ad-free account - only £3.49 GBP per year. 

WEATHERZONE PRO ACCOUNT [MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION]
For £3.49 GBP per month, you can get the ad-free experience, plus the following exclusive app features: 
◆ See individual lightning strikes on the Radar Map 
◆ Get hourly breakdowns for wind gusts and cloud coverage in Hourly Graphs

Please note: Weatherzone is growing fast globally, and while our app provides local forecasts, some features may not be available in all regions yet - but sit tight! We’re continuing to expand to more locations. 

Recognised by the World Meteorological Organization, Weatherzone is an award-winning weather app for iPhone & iPad known for its quality of data, live weather updates, reliability, and user interface. Join millions of people who rely on our accurate weather forecasts and features. Plan for today, tomorrow, and the week ahead with our comprehensive weather forecasts, including a real-time radar, severe weather warnings, sunrise and sunset times, and detailed hourly weather changes. 

Need help with the app or your account? Simply send through your enquiries, feedback, and suggestions to us at help@weatherzone.com

The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster*. With extreme weather on the rise, prepare yourself for storms, hurricanes & wildfires. Track daily forecasts and receive live radar updates, storm alerts, & local precipitation updates.

Our live Doppler radar maps, storm watch, and hurricane tracker can warn you ahead of time of severe storms, heavy rain, heat waves, or an incoming flood. Receive your forecast updates and rest assured with our weather warnings. Severe weather is increasing - our severe weather alerts have you covered.

Plan up to 15 days in advance with forecasts from the World’s Most Accurate Weather Forecaster, so you can plan ahead with confidence*. Manage personal weather alerts, so you receive notifications that are important to you.

Download The Weather Channel to get you through storm season, hurricane season & extreme weather warnings.

The Weather Channel Features:

Today’s Weather Forecast:

- 15-minute forecast for rain intensity up to 7 hours in the future & radar on your homescreen
- Check weather forecasts up to two weeks in advance!
- Prepare for severe storms & hurricane season
- Monitor breathing conditions with our Air Quality Index forecast

Widget & Homescreen Features:
- Our smart widget offers more weather in detail at a glance and one-tap access to the forecast
- Check your local radar, get severe weather alerts in your area, and check the forecast for the next three hours on your homescreen

Additional Features:
- Detailed information on sunset times 
- Stay prepared during extreme weather events, hurricanes, and earthquakes with live breaking news alerts
---
Upgrade to The Weather Channel Premium for our most comprehensive, dynamic, and precise weather experience available. Exclusive access to:
- Ad-free weather
- 15-minute forecast details
- Advanced 72-Hour Future Radar
- and more!

You can cancel The Weather Channel subscription anytime through your App Store account settings, or it will automatically renew. This must be done 24 hours before the end of any subscription period to avoid being charged another fee. Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Privacy & Feedback
•Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://weather.com/en-US/twc/privacy-policy
•Our Terms of Use can be viewed here: http://www.weather.com/common/home/legal.html
•If you have any questions or suggestions about our weather service, please do not hesitate to get in touch at iphonesupport@weather.com

*The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster. According ForecastWatch, Global and Regional Weather Forecast Accuracy Overview, 2021-2024, https://forecastwatch.com/AccuracyOverview2021-2024, commissioned by The Weather Company.

**The Weather Channel is the Most Trusted News Source In America. According to a YouGov 2024 Trust in Media poll: https://today.yougov.com/politics/articles/49552-trust-in-media-2024-which-news-outlets-americans-trust

•Welcome to BigBlue: Your Ultimate Sport Fishing Companion•

Unlock the full potential of your fishing adventures with BigBlue, the cutting-edge app designed to get you on the fish fast, save fuel and catch the fish of a lifetime. We equip the best saltwater anglers with the data and tools they need to track fish, find rips and navigate to pelagic hot spots.


•BigBlue: Raising the Bar in Sport Fishing Technology•

Explore a comprehensive suite of features and best-in-class functionalities:
• Unrivaled Global Coverage: Access comprehensive global charts with 9 daily sea surface temperature (SST) scans, 4 true color scans, and 3 chlorophyll scans, all updated in near-real-time as satellites orbit the Earth. Find seamounts, canyons and structure with our global bathymetry data.
• Pinpoint Geospatial Information: Utilize high-resolution data contour lines wherever chlorophyll and sea surface temperature data is available, optimizing your knowledge of prime fishing locations.
• Streamlined Navigation: Orient to waypoints with precise heading, course, and speed instruments designed to help increase efficiency and save gas.
• Easily visualize your position relative to prime pelagic habitats, plan your route, and save your favorite fishing spots for future reference.
• Expert Per-Species Habitat Information: Access in-depth habitat information for sport fish species, including various tuna, marlin, sailfish, wahoo, mahi mahi and more, curated by experts and backed by scientific research.
• Versatile Applications: BigBlue has transformed the experiences of not only anglers but also scuba divers, free divers, marine biologists, whale watching guides, and ocean enthusiasts who seek insights into ocean temperatures, clarity, and marine life.
• Offline (Offshore) Maps: Easily save and view the whole set of data charts for access offline for your custom region 

Join the BigBlue community today to unlock a world of unparalleled fishing adventures and extraordinary success. Save time, conserve fuel, and catch more fish. Download BigBlue now and discover the difference! 


Marine species covered in our guide:

Windy.app - wind, waves and weather forecast app for surfers, kitesurfers, windsurfers, sailors, fishermen and other wind sports. 

FEATURES:
•  Wind report, forecast and statistics: wind map, accurate wind compass, wind meter, wind gusts and wind directions. It’s very useful for extreme wind sports.
•  Wind alert: Set up windalert and be aware of wind, storm and tornado warning via push-notifications
•  Weather history (archive) for 2012-2024: view wind data, temperature (day and night) and atmospheric pressure. Weather archive will help you to choose the best month for travel to the spot.
•  Local forecast from NOAA: temperature in Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin, humidity, wind speed, precipitation (rain and snow). Forecast for 10 days with 3 hours step in metric or imperial units: m/s (mps), mph, km/h, knt (knout), bft (beaufort), m, ft, mm, cm, in, hPa, inHg. NOAA is a National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration / National Weather Service (nws).
•  Wave forecast: ocean or sea conditions, ocean waves and sea swell, fishing forecast
•  Animated wind tracker: weather radar for sailing, yachting and kiting in light wind
•  Cloud base/Dewpoint (dew point) data: necessary weather information for pleasant paragliding 
•  Spots: over 30.000 spots sorted and located by the type and area. Add your spots to favourites.
•  Spot chats. Got anemometer? Share info about weather conditions and wind direction in the chat from a kite spot.
•  Community: exchange weather reports on the spot. Want to be a local/spot leader? Email us the name of your spot at feedback@catchwind.co and we will create a chat for it.
•  Weather Stations: online data from nearby online weather stations.
•  Offline Mode: activate offline mode and check the forecast for your activities without internet connection.

PERFECT FOR:

• Windsurfing (wind surf)

What people say about HD Thermometer ⊎:

- It is a great app! It shows the temperature of your current location. That does not mean that your phone becomes a thermometer and can read the temperature of the surrounding area, using a weather service. A lot of idiots download this app and complain that their phone can't read the temperature indoors. Of course it can't! It's a phone, and no matter what app or other software you install on it, it will never be able to read the temperature of its immediate surroundings unless you had some hardware already installed that can do so, and a touch-screen phone simply cannot take someone's temperature.

The great outdoors offers a world of adventure and relaxation. But the weather can sometimes play a crucial role in determining the success of your outdoor activities. Knowing and using weather forecasts can greatly improve your outdoor experiences, whether it’s a hike, a picnic with kids, or any other activity. If you need to be careful about what you’re breathing outside, this app will give you the useful information.

- Air Quality and Pollen Tracker app provides accurate and real-time air quality index (AQI), air pollution and weather updates from the nearest air quality monitoring station to your current location. 
- By connecting to Google's Pollen Data source, this app also displays Universal Pollen Index (UPI) that helps assess the risk of pollen exposure based on various factors for people allergic or sensitive to pollen.

Best features:
- Real-time air quality index (AQI)
- Current weather info in your area include 'feels-like' temperature, wind speed, visibility, UV Index, Dew Point, Humidity
- Show Pollen Details Screen with 6 levels of pollen for all plant and pollen types. Depend on each level, we show the health recommendations.
- A detail screen contains all parameters of air pollution like PM10, Sulfur dioxide (SO2), Nitrogen dioxide (NO2) ...
- Rankings of the most polluted cities in your country and 100 most polluted cities in the world.
- Easy to change the background color, text color for the home screen

Notes:
AQI Data provided by World Air Quality Index Project (waqi.info and aqicn.org)
Weather info provided by Apple Weather
Pollen data provided by Google Pollen API
